track.name: Bring It On
comments: oh, Leif I am late but now I am here - 7/27
Love the nods in this track to Please Mister Postman and Be My Baby. Enhances an already good song.

...such a strong voice, makes a lot of fun to listen..!

Slowly falling back in love with this song

Wait a minute, wait a minute! (Wasn't I good to you?)
Wait a minute, wait a minute! (Wasn't I good to you?)
Wait a minute, wait a minute (You don't know what's good for you)

Who's gonna keep my baby warm (who's gonna keep my baby warm)
When everybody goes?
After repeated listens this one has emerged as very possibly my favourite on this album.
one of my favourite tunes from this album! classic!
